title: Get Smart: Resources for Data Science

The post Get Smart: Resources for Data Science appeared first on The Data Science Bowl.
content:encoded:
Data science saw a 56% increase in job openings in the US in the last year according to LinkedIn. It’s also been at the top of Glassdoor’s Best Jobs in America for three consecutive years. If competing in the Data Science Bowl has you thinking about a career in data science, or simply boosting your skill set, our own Kirk Borne has compiled a list of resources to help.

Kirk Borne, Principal Data Scientist at Booz Allen, recommends starting with The Booz Allen Field Guide to Data Science and then diving deep into some of these resources:

  • NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute
  • Metis Data Science Training
  • Leada’s online analytics labs
  • Data Science Training by General Assembly
  • Learn Data Science Online by DataCamp
  • (600+) Colleges and Universities with Data Science Degrees
  • Data Science Master’s Degree Programs
  • Data Analytics, Machine Learning, & Statistics Courses at edX
  • Data Science Certifications (by AnalyticsVidhya)
  • Learn Everything About Analytics (by AnalyticsVidhya)
  • NYC Data Science Academy
  • Big Bang Data Science Solutions
  • CommonLounge
  • IntelliPaat Online Training
  • DataQuest
  • NCSU Institute for Advanced Analytics
  • District Data Labs
  • Data School
  • Coursera
  • Udacity Nanodegree Program to Become a Data Scientist
  • Udemy – Data & Analytics
  • Insight Data Science Fellows Program
  • The Open Source Data Science Masters
  • Jigsaw Academy Post Graduate Program in Data Science & Machine Learning
  • O’Reilly Media Learning Paths
  • Data Engineering and Data Science Training by Go Data Driven
  • 18 Resources to Learn Data Science Online (by Simplilearn)
  • Top Online Data Science Courses to Learn Data Science

The post Get Smart: Resources for Data Science appeared first on The Data Science Bowl.
